name: fsa-spending-controls-approved-exemptions
title: FSA Spending Controls - Approved Exemptions
description: As part of the government's commitment to greater transparency, the FSA publishes quarterly data summaries of expenditure approvals for ICT, advertising and marketing, recruitment, property and consultancy controls.
